overview: Yusuf Azizullah is a professor of Strategy at the Robert Smith School of Business at University of Maryland. He has also taught MBA Finance courses at Johns Hopkins University. He advises Audit Committee Board members & executives on Business & IT Strategy, Operational Risks, Sarbanes Oxley SOX, Doddâ€“Frank, US GAAP IFRS Standards compliance with FASB, IASB, SEC & PCAOB regulations & Financial reporting XBRL Taxonomy. He is a regular speaker at Conferences and trainer to executives. Some of his clients include; Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, AOL, Assurant, AstraZeneca & Thomson Reuters.
